subject: Payment Failed
email_text: Hi support, my payment failed yesterday but the amount was deducted.\nPlease help.
reply:
Hi Customer,

Thank you for contacting us.

Hi support, my payment failed yesterday but the amount was deducted. Please help.

I’ve shared your details with our billing team so they can review the transaction and trace the payment. We’ll update you with the resolution and any refund/adjustment details as soon as we have an update.

Best regards,
